Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Saria's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #the Boomerang#.
